document_data.name: Weeping Desert
document_data.mainbody: The '''Weeping Desert''' was located in the [[Haunted Lands]] of [[interior Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: It was a sandy expanse running from limestone hills at the base of the [[Furrowed Mountains]] to massive [[Wikipedia:Barchan|barchan]] dunes separating it from the [[Burning Lands]].
document_data.Inhabitants: By [[1367 DR]],{{AQ-time}} the Weeping Desert earned its name from the prevalence of [[undead]] spirits, such as [[ghost]]s, [[Ghost mount|ghost horses]], and the undead [[giant]]s known as [[rom]]. A large set of ruins was believed to be the source of the keening sounds that kept travelers awake at night. A large clan of rom was hidden beneath this ruin at the magical underground spring known as the [[Well of Despair]].<ref>
